participant_1.background:
I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
i really love plants.
i am an environmental engineer.
i like hiking up volcanoes.
i m always happy when the summer ends.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening, which helps to calm me down before I start my day.
i trust in god.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
i work as a police officer.
i live in north dakota.

content.text: Good morning! How are you today?
Good morning! I am doing well. How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you.
I am glad to hear that. What do you do for a living?
I am an environmental engineer. I love working with plants.
That sounds like a great job. I love plants too. I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening.
That sounds like a great way to start the day. I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
I understand that. I am a police officer and I work long hours, but I love my job.
I am glad that you love your job. What do you like the most about it?
I like helping people and making a difference in my community.
That is a great reason to be a police officer.
Thank you. I am also an avid outdoorsman. I love hiking, fishing, and hunting.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have always wanted to go hiking up a volcano.
That would be an awesome experience. I have hiked up a few volcanoes, but they are all very different.
I am sure they are. I would love to hear about your experiences.
I would be happy to tell you about them sometime
